column8: Talking Heads may not be to everyone’s tastes. If you want your music to make sense, or to come in the form of a commercialized, plastic and ultimately soulless piece of pop crap, then look elsewhere. But for the fans of Talking Heads, nothing else will do. It’s hard to summarize their music into a single sentence, as it’s a diverse mixture of surreal lyrics, wacky performances and cultural references (actually, I just did sum it up n a sentence!), so all I can do is ask you to watch the below video. Same as it ever was…..
